text: Michelle Emma May Elizabeth Donelan (born 8 April 1984) is a British politician. She has been the Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology since February 2023. She was Minister of State for Higher and Further Education from 2020 to 2022 and Secretary of State for Education for two days during the July 2022 UK government crisis. She is a member of the Conservative Party. She has been Member of Parliament (MP) for Chippenham in Wiltshire since 2015. ==References== ==Notes== ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Cheshire Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024
title: Michelle Donelan
